document_title: Stomach pain (stomach pain): Causes, symptoms, and diagnosis
subsection_content: To diagnose stomach pain, the doctor will initially ask some questions to understand the patient's current medical situation. It could be the location, level of pain, changes in urine... Then, depending on the condition, the doctor will decide on the appropriate diagnosis method. Esophagogastroduodenoscopy is the best method to diagnose the cause. In addition, abdominal ultrasound, abdominal X-ray or CT scan, magnetic resonance... also help diagnose and rule out other diseases.

dau da day.json. How to diagnose stomach pain
To diagnose stomach pain, the doctor will initially ask some questions to understand the patient's current medical situation. It could be the location, level of pain, changes in urine... Then, depending on the condition, the doctor will decide on the appropriate diagnosis method. Esophagogastroduodenoscopy is the best method to diagnose the cause. In addition, abdominal ultrasound, abdominal X-ray or CT scan, magnetic resonance... also help diagnose and rule out other diseases.
